basics.name: Eric Botello
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the Department of Electrical Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021.

work.company: UH Manoa Student Athletics Academic Services
work.summary: I.T. Support for Nagatani Academic Center
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official SAAS website
Assist students and staff with computer and database related problems
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues
Maintain integrity of communications through proper network encryption
Configured and maintained 300+ systems across 5 classified networks to support intelligence operations
Requested, installed, and integrated advanced hardware/software to meet increasing demands and evolving mission requirements
Assist other veteran students with school work
